text: Gerald Ellis Hannahs (born March 6, 1953) is a former pitcher in Major League Baseball. He pitched for the Los Angeles Dodgers and Montreal Expos from –. ==Career== On April 16, 1977, Hannahs became the first Expos pitcher to earn a victory at Olympic Stadium.1986 Topps baseball card # 154 Hannahs played college baseball for the University of Arkansas. His son, Dusty, played basketball for the Razorbacks and now plays professionally for the Memphis Grizzlies. ==References== ==External links== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Albuquerque Dukes players Category:American expatriate baseball players in Canada Category:Arkansas Razorbacks baseball players Category:Baseball players from New York (state) Category:Denver Bears players Category:Gulf Coast Expos players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Memphis Chicks players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Québec Carnavals players Category:Quebec Metros players Category:San Antonio Dodgers players Category:Sportspeople from Binghamton, New York Category:Toledo Mud Hens players Category:West Palm Beach Expos players
title: Gerry Hannahs
